question.sentence: I'll love you for ever if you marry me.
If you wear that dress to the party, you'll look great.
I'll call the police unless you stop that noise at once.
Unless I find a nice flat I'll live with my parents.
If your sister tells her friends that, they'll laugh at her.
We'll lend you the money if you pay us back next month.
I'll listen to your story if you read it to me.
You'll lose that ticket unless you put it in your pocket.
If he tries some of this soup, I'm sure he'll like it.
